raiseHandPrompt: We have a question or comment from the audience, please invite a human speaker called [NAME] to the debate. After listening to the human, answer and engage deeper with their thoughts.
finalizeMeetingPrompt: Please summarise whole Spirit of Assilomar meeting, held on 23-26 Feb 2025, producing a pubilc statement of what was the conclusion, including information about who signed it, and who didn't. Including points of dissent.
